title: Pregnancy And COVID-19: What We Know And How To Protect Yourself
description: How dangerous is COVID-19 for pregnant women and their babies? The research has been scant and the data spotty.  Dr. Laura Riley, the chair of obstetrics and gynecology at Weill Cornell Medicine and the Obstetrician-in-Chief at New York-Presbyterian, explains what we know at this point and what pregnant women can do to protect themselves.
